title: Whip wielder Champion, when?
body: Like, for real? when is it going to happen?

replies.body:
I just put together a champion design using an Urumi (sword whip). http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/r9k1wfkx-champion-concept-khorwyn-piltovers-blade

Definitely agree though, it'd be cool to have a champion with a whip/whip-like weapon, and with 124 (soon to be 125 champions) you think we'd have one by now xD
just rework Eve and give her a whip, done.
